review: divinity original sin felt underwhelming to me after playing its sequel and baldurs gate 3 i was craving more larian studios magic but was disappointed the gameplay feels very basic and the rockpaperscissors decision system is lackluster the music is actually good and the story is decent but the graphics are quite dated final score 510 only play this if you are a hardcore fan of crpgs otherwise skip it

divinity original sin is a big fun rpg game kinda hard kinda brutal but a solid game for its time with an interesting world and story that doesnt take itself too seriously leaving room for a lot of fun
